price: 8. Baye bana esika na bango ekozalaka nde na moto тропа maye bazalaki kosala.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
